comment.author: 67164508@N08
comment._content: I didn't know if there were other Tillie Yoders out there! It's not often you run into someone with the same name, Being from Ohio, there might be some family connection... I wonder!

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Thanks for your comment, Tillie.  I wondered whether you'd find "the other Tillie Yoder" -- the one who now lives in the archives.  As a founder of Camp Ebenezer, which ministered to African American youth in the late 1940s, Tillie did some amazing and pioneering work as a very young person.  A pretty cool namesake, no?
